alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 10:00PM EDT until October 03 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. Water levels remain elevated and expect little relief this evening during the next low tide. * WHERE...Bayside communities of the Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
